basics.name: Tara Marchand
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer specializing in UI.

highlights: As part of Incubator innovation team, improve and enhance JavaScript mapping framework for consumer product platform.
Define technical standards and processes; break down and scope projects.
Collaborate with engineers, product managers, and designers; mentor junior engineers.
Led UI engineering for company's internal data organization.
Built tools to analyze customer data using TypeScript-based React components.
Developed UI for New Relic's Infrastructure monitoring product.
Google: Led Python development of billing application in an embedded agency team.
Dignity Health: Led technology discipline agency-side. Analyzed, recommended, and developed digital solutions.
Nike Events Platform: Led UI development for responsive, localized high-traffic web experiences. Managed 2 UI engineers.
Microsoft's Surface.com: Architected and developed a responsive website on a custom CMS for this new tablet's launch.
Nike+ FuelBand.com: Built the website UI for the debut of this activity tracker. Created user data visualizations.
Promoted from Front End Solutions Architect and previously from Senior Presentation Code Developer.
Adobe Marketplace: Engineered the UI for application offering software extensions and add-ons.
Lexus.com: Developed and managed the UI for Lexus.com and other websites for related brands Toyota and Scion.
Amgen and Wyeth: Developed UIs for patient education websites.
Amgen; Sprint: Built HTML emails, launched campaigns, and analyzed engagement.

skills.name: Interests
keywords: visual and interaction design, user experience
